name: Admin removes User from org via **CLI**
description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user` via **UI**.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.
- Add `second user` to organization with `User` role via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can remove `User` from organization via **CLI**.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user via UI.
  • Login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Add second user to organization with User role via CLI.

Verify that:

  • Admin can remove User from organization via CLI.

steps.name: Verify Apolo CLI client is installed

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user` via **UI**.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.
- Add `second user` to organization with `User` role via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can remove `User` from organization via **CLI**.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user via UI.
  • Login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Add second user to organization with User role via CLI.

Verify that:

  • Admin can remove User from organization via CLI.
